title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—browser & Node.js support.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama—chat, generate, embed, pull, push.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in chains.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for any Ollama model—Markdown, code highlighting, multi-chat.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI wrapper around Ollama with conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama—chat, generate, pull, list models with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama—supports streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal npm package to chat with Ollama from Node-RED or CLI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team—use local models for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers via Ollama models; slash commands & thread support.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM calls.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Official example repo: build a private RAG system with Ollama, Chroma and LangChain.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams query local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express middleware to proxy and cache Ollama endpoints for web apps.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama—embeddable in CLI tools and cloud services.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile collection for CodeLlama, WizardMath, Zephyr, etc.
